Title: The Simpsons
Actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
Plot: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
Language: English, Spanish, Albanian, French, Japanese, German, Russian, Hindi, Swahili, Italian, Swedish, Turkish, Cantonese, Mandarin, Hebrew, Arabic, Klingon, Bengali
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 127 wins & 182 nominations.
